title: A sermon preached before the Honorable House of Commons: at Margarets Westminster, upon the 26. day of August 1645. being the day of their solemne monethly fast. / By John Lightfoot, a member of the Assembly of Divines.
author: Lightfoot, John, 1602-1675.
publisher: Printed by R.C. for Andrew Crook, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Greene Dragon in Pauls Churchyard,
notes: McAlpin Catalogue, Union Theological Seminary, reports two copies, one as above, and one with hyphen in "Margarets Westminster".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
